name: Ilham
text: One of the best hotel club I have been too The staff were excellent, always smiling and a great vibe...the waiters were exceptional...Attention to details. The entertainment team ( special thanks to Loubna,Leyla and Hayoob) were fantastic. I will definitely recommend it specially with kids. Love it

name: Salma
text: Beautiful property, very family friendly with lots of spaces for the kids to play and have a great time. Our 3 year old went 2 afternoons to the kids club and seemed to enjoy it. The location is very convenient to visit the city and lots of nice restaurants/mall close by. Not a 5 stars for sure, 4 stars at most.

name: Margaret
text: Swimming pools very good Room was good but there were a number of little electrical problems such as bathroom fan not working and some of the wall plugs not working and also light bulb not functioning.

name: Younes
text: The location was perfect. The restaurant had many choices for kids and adults and it was delicious. The servers were very nice and very accommodating. The rooms were clean and comfortable and more importantly very quiet at night. The property is beautiful and they've maintained their high standards since my last visit back in 2012. So everything was as expected and a bit more, we even extended our stay.

name: Soumia
text: Beatiful trees and bird singing in mornings

name: Agnes
text: perfect hotel for a nice holiday, staff super friendly , animation team super they try everything to lake you feel,good dispite covid situation, staff at reception very helpfull, everythingalways clean, love this hotel 😍

name: Zakaria
text: The receptionist on my check in was just super friendly and helpful, At that moment I knew the stay is gonna be good. Loved the morning walk, green everywhere and long walk paths, the restaurant had a variety of food and went above and beyond for every request. Room was clean and spacious with a nice balcony. The pool bar was fun and the guys there super nice.

name: Terry
text: Great place for the family to spend with kids.

name: Hind
text: The activities for the kids, the pool, the food

name: Saad
text: Property was good , we had few issues the first night.. we had two rooms since we have 3 kids , 1st night we’ve checked in one of the rooms the bidet had a leak plus the ACs we not blowing cold air also the minibars didn’t cool our drinks ( it barely keep them cold ) also the beds were not comfortable at all .. we asked the front desk to change the rooms and they did ( very nice staff, Sanaa and Zouhair at the front desk were super nice and helpful ). Everyone at the hotel (staff wise) were very nice and professional. Also the food was great as well as the animation team by the pool , with few upgrades to the beds and TVs this place would be a 10/10. Overall it’s a very great hotel with very professional/ helpful staff and I would for sure comeback and recommend it to family and friends.
